_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_QueryEntity

_a-0000ed20-1ca4-8000-9d2b-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QE_GetWorkflowPath
_a-0000ed20-1ca4-8000-9d2b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryEntity(
  entity: cons!CMGT_ENT_WORKFLOW_PATH,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CMGT}CMGT_WorkflowPath',
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "startConditionTaskInstanceUuid",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!startConditionTaskInstanceUuid
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "caseId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!caseId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(ri!isActive, true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  logicalExpression: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    ri!returnType,
    cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  pagingInfo: if(
    ri!returnType <> cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
    null,
    a!defaultValue(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_MEDIUM)
    )
  ),
  excludeNestedCdts:ri!excludeNestedCdts
)

0002ed38-caac-8000-1d75-7f0000014e7a.name: CMGT_NightlySync_SingleCaseWorkflowPathAndMapping_Delete

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_zInternal_QueryEntity_DetermineSort

_a-0000e9d3-70bf-8000-9bbd-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_returnTypeNumber

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_ReturnArrayTypeNumber

_a-0000e9d3-70bf-8000-9bbd-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_checkIfSingleType
CMGT_UTIL_cast

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_zINTERNAL_ReturnCdtFields_Handler

_a-0000ed24-7935-8000-9d2d-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QE_GetWorkflowPathMapping
_a-0000ed24-7935-8000-9d2d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryEntity(
  entity: cons!CMGT_ENT_WORKFLOW_PATH_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CMGT}CMGT_WorkflowPathMapping',
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "workflowPathId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!workflowPathId,
      applyWhen: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!workflowPathId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(ri!isActive, true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  logicalExpression: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    ri!returnType,
    cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  pagingInfo: if(
    ri!returnType <> cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
    null,
    a!defaultValue(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_MEDIUM)
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_zINTERNAL_ReturnCdtFields_PrimitiveTypeCheckHandler
CMGT_UTIL_DisplayValue
_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_ReturnCdtFields

_a-0000e9d3-70bf-8000-9bbd-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_returnSingleTypeObject

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_WhereContains
CMGT_UTIL_ChooseWhereContainsHelper
_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer',
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReplaceNull(
    nullableValue: rule!CMGT_UTIL_WhereContains(values: ri!value, array: ri!inArray) + 1,
    replacementValue: 1
  )
)
